sq(x)=x*x;
r=sqrt(sq(x-1806)+sq(y-1806))/1806;
sf=(1/(((-2.11151841208553)*(r^8))+((-0.00000000000000295190265753503)*(r^7))+((3.66825171388962)*(r^6))+((0.0000000000000030452457684329)*(r^5))+((-2.24835515006869)*(r^4))+((-0.000000000000000631163653663639)*(r^3))+((0.390822570028146)*(r^2))+((-0.000000000000000446250553333187)*r)+1));
ro=sf*ri(1);
go=sf*gi(1);
bo=sf*bi(1);
